description:
As the class battles conclude, Midoriya works with All Might and Bakugo on learning more about his new power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Atarashii Chikara to All for One
Eine neue Kraft und All For One
Nouveaux pouvoirs et All For One
The New Power and All for One
新しい力とオール・フォー・ワン
